TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed Environment/SpecialFolder extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定用于检索系统特殊文件夹的目录路径的枚举常数。

span.span: Specifies enumerated constants used to retrieve directory paths to system special folders.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 系统特殊文件夹是包含常见信息的文件夹，例如 **程序文件**、 **程序**、 **系统**或 **启动**。The system special folders are folders such as **Program Files**, **Programs**, **System**, or **Startup**, which contain common information. 默认情况下，特殊文件夹由系统设置，或在安装 Windows 版本时由用户显式设置。Special folders are set by default by the system, or explicitly by the user, when installing a version of Windows. 方法返回与此枚举关联的位置。The method returns the locations associated with this enumeration. 这些文件夹的位置在不同的操作系统上可能具有不同的值，用户可以更改某些位置，并且这些位置已本地化。The locations of these folders can have different values on different operating systems, the user can change some of the locations, and the locations are localized. 有关特殊文件夹的详细信息，请参阅 Windows 文档中的 [KNOWNFOLDERID](/windows/desktop/shell/knownfolderid) 常量。For more information about special folders, see the [KNOWNFOLDERID](/windows/desktop/shell/knownfolderid) constants in the Windows documentation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 与方法结合使用 来获取系统目录。The following example shows how to use with the method to get the System directory. [!code-cpp[Environment.GetFolderPath#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetFolderPath/CPP/getfolderpath.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Environment.GetFolderPath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetFolderPath/CS/getfolderpath.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.GetFolderPath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetFolderPath/VB/getfolderpath.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder AdminTools = int32(48)
AdminTools = 48

summary.span: 用于存储各个用户的管理工具的文件系统目录。

span.span: The file system directory that is used to store administrative tools for an individual user.

summary.span: Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 会将自定义的控制台保存在此目录中，并且此目录将随用户一起漫游。

span.span: The Microsoft Management Console (MMC) will save customized consoles to this directory, and it will roam with the user.

summary.span: 已添加到 .NET Framework 4 中。

span.span: Added in the .NET Framework 4.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder ApplicationData = int32(26)
ApplicationData = 26

summary.span: 用作当前漫游用户的应用程序特定数据的公共储存库的目录。

span.span: The directory that serves as a common repository for application-specific data for the current roaming user.

summary.span: 漫游用户在网络上的多台计算机上工作。

span.span: A roaming user works on more than one computer on a network.

summary.span: 漫游用户的配置文件保留在网络服务器上，并在用户登录时加载到系统中。

span.span: A roaming user's profile is kept on a server on the network and is loaded onto a system when the user logs on.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CDBurning = int32(59)
CDBurning = 59

summary.span: 充当等待写入 CD 的文件的临时区域的文件系统目录。

span.span: The file system directory that acts as a staging area for files waiting to be written to a CD.

summary.span: 已添加到 .NET Framework 4 中。

span.span: Added in the .NET Framework 4.

CommonAdminTools = 47

span.span: The file system directory that contains administrative tools for all users of the computer.

span.span: Added in the .NET Framework 4.

CommonApplicationData = 35

summary.span: 用作所有用户使用的应用程序特定数据的公共储存库的目录。

span.span: The directory that serves as a common repository for application-specific data that is used by all users.

CommonDesktopDirectory = 25

summary.span: 包含在所有用户桌面上出现的文件和文件夹的文件系统目录。

summary.span: 此特殊文件夹仅对 Windows NT 系统有效。

span.span: This special folder is valid only for Windows NT systems.

span.span: Added in the .NET Framework 4.

summary.span: 此特殊文件夹仅对装有 Shfolder.dll 的 Windows NT 系统、Windows 95 和 Windows 98 系统有效。

span.span: Added in the .NET Framework 4.

summary.span: “我的计算机”文件夹\*\*\*\*。

span.span: The **My Computer** folder.

summary.span: 传递给 方法时， 枚举成员始终生成空字符串（""），这是因为没有为“我的电脑”文件夹定义路径。

span.span: When passed to the method, the enumeration member always yields the empty string ("") because no path is defined for the My Computer folder.

summary.span: 应用程序不应在此级别上创建文件或文件夹；它们应将其数据放在 所引用的位置之下。

span.span: Applications should not create files or folders at this level; they should put their data under the locations referred to by .

summary.span: Windows 目录或 SYSROOT。

summary.span: 它与 %windir% 或 %SYSTEMROOT% 环境变量相对应。

span.span: This corresponds to the %windir% or %SYSTEMROOT% environment variables.
